synopsis.text: As sembled in a dilapidated lab in Akihabara, Tokyo, an eccentric self-proclaimed mad scientist, Rintarou Okabe, and his friends, the air-headed Mayuri Shiina and the perverted hacker Itaru Hashida, work tirelessly on inventing futuristic gadgets. Their most intriguing invention to date, the Phone Microwave, has the peculiar ability to turn bananas into green goo. However, an unexpected breakthrough occurs when they discover that the Phone Microwave can send emails to the past, altering the course of history. As Okabe and his friends delve deeper into the world of time manipulation, they attract the attention of the mysterious organization SERN, which has its own agenda on time travel research. Faced with the consequences of meddling with time, Okabe must navigate the complexities of scientific theory and reality to protect his friends and preserve his sanity. Based on the critically acclaimed visual novel by 5pb. and Nitroplus, Steins;Gate is a thrilling exploration of time travel and its repercussions.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
